Package space.sunqian.common.io.communicate

Class AbstractChannelContext<C extends ByteChannel>

java.lang.Object
space.sunqian.common.io.communicate.AbstractChannelContext<C>
Type Parameters:
C - the type of the underlying channel
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChannelContext<C>, ChannelReader<C>, ChannelWriter<C>
public abstract class AbstractChannelContext<C extends ByteChannel> extends Object implements ChannelContext<C>
Skeletal implementation of ChannelContext to help minimize effort in implementing ChannelContext.

The read and write methods of this class is based on a given ByteChannel, which also serves as the underlying channel. And the advanced I/O operations are based on the operator witch is gotten by the specified buffer size. These two field is accessible for subclasses: channel and operator.

    • availableBuffer

      @Nullable public @Nullable ByteBuffer availableBuffer() throws IORuntimeException
      Description copied from interface: ChannelReader
      Returns all available bytes as a buffer in the underlying channel, possibly empty if no data is available but the channel is still alive, or null if the channel is closed. The position of the buffer is 0.
